name: The Lost Marble
description:
The Lost Marble is a platformer in which the player controls an intrepid marble. Roll fast, hop gaps, push cubes, explore and avoid enemies to find the goal of each level. Create and share levels too!

Includes 20 hand-made levels, unlockable marbles, leaderboards, and an in-game level editor.

Steam Workshop: Download and share your user created levels through the steam workshop!

Steam Leaderboards: Compete for the best times on 20 levels!

Controller Support: Playing on a controller is recommended but not required.
